section.hand:
Fr
o
my L. T
re
r.

page.lettertext:
fol.152r
Belgia: 1591: May.
[.]
belonging to one
Gisberd Jacob
of
Amsterdame,
Coming late
out of
Spayne,
putt in at
Dover,
and from thence, are go
[ne]
for Amsterdame. In the said hulke, ther were 2 englishe
me
n
, by whom it is Confessed unto mee that ther were in
the said hulke diverse papers l
re
s, and Bookes sent out of
Spayne by certain englishe men there, as may appeare unto yo
w
by the included paper, Now for that the said thing
are of
good moment and importa
u
ce to be recovered I have thoug
ht
good to require yo
w
to imploye some parson both discrete and
trustie for the getting of
em into his handes For
e better
parforming wherof I send yo
w
also hereincluded a l
re
written
from one
John Snowden
being one of the 2 englishmen abov
e
mencioned, unto
e said Gisberd Jacob for the delivery of
e
said thing
unto the bearer thereof. I pray yo
w
use Carefull
[.]
in the Choise of him yo
w
mynd to send, an d give him such
other dyrections as yo
w
thinke nedefull for the better accomplis
hing
of his purpose. And if so be it heppen that he shall obteyn
them I pray yo
w
cause them to be sent w
th
as much Conven
ient
spede as may be.
So Fare yo
w
verie hartely well. From
my howse at Westm
r
this
21 of Maye
1591
Yo
r
verie Lovinge frend.
William Burghley
